text.text_translated:
'Life of Pi' is the name of a book.  
The author is Canadian.  
His name is Yann Martel.  
He is the son of a diplomat.  
As a child, he lived in Costa Rica.  
He also lived in Canada, France and Mexico.  
It tells Pi's story.  
Pi is a teenage boy from India.  
He is shipwrecked in the Pacific Ocean.  
He is in a lifeboat with a tiger.  
It is the third book by Martel.  
It came out in 2001.  
It sold over seven million copies worldwide.  
It won several prizes and been translated into 41 languages.

best_attempt.text_translated:
‘Life of Pi’ is a book by Yann Martel.  
It tells the story of Pi.  
Pi is a teenage boy from India.  
His ship sank in the Pacific Ocean.  
He is alone in a lifeboat with a wild tiger.  
This is Martel’s third book.  
He published it in 2001.  
It sold over seven million copies.  
It won several prizes.  
People translated it into 41 languages.  
Martel is the son of a diplomat.  
As a child, he lived in Costa Rica, Canada, France and Mexico.
